firstSteps.calculationDetails: Complete at least 5 tasks across all subjects and difficulties. Progress: {{totalTasks}} / 5 tasks.

dedicated.name: Dedicated
dedicated.calculationDetails: Complete at least one task per day for 3 consecutive days. Your current streak: {{currentStreak}} days. Best: {{bestStreak}} days.

weekWarrior.name: Week Warrior
weekWarrior.calculationDetails: Complete at least one task per day for 7 consecutive days. Your current streak: {{currentStreak}} days. Best: {{bestStreak}} days.

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
sharpshooter.calculationDetails: Complete 10 tasks in a row with perfect scores (no wrong answers). Current run: {{currentPerfect}}. Best: {{bestPerfect}}.

speedDemon.name: Speed Demon
speedDemon.calculationDetails: Complete 5 tasks without using hints within the same week. This week: {{noHintThisWeek}} / 5 tasks.

polymath.name: Polymath
polymath.calculationDetails: Achieve at least 3 stars in all available subjects. Each subject needs significant practice and high accuracy to reach 3+ stars.

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.calculationDetails: Reach level 10 by completing 100 total tasks. Level 10 unlocks at 100 tasks. Progress: {{totalTasks}} / 100 tasks.

master.name: Master
master.description: Max out (5 stars) in any subject
master.calculationDetails: Achieve 5-star mastery in any subject. Requires 100+ tasks with 90%+ success rate in that subject.
